name: Fire Hazard
description:
This game was made during the CSSA Game Jam 2021, with the theme "Don't stop moving".

Made by: Dang Nguyen, Mihir Sharma, Thomas Tran, Yasin Newaz

Assets Used:

- Dungeon tile set (walls, fire traps, special fire traps, pressure plate): 

Author: pixel_poem

Itch.io link: https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

Modification: Trap-door was edited to look like a pressure plate

- Character sprite & Heart pick-up:

Author:  0x72
Itch.io link: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii

- Death explosion:

Author:  ansimuz
Itch.io link: https://ansimuz.itch.io/explosion-animations-pack

- Fire: 

Author: sanctumpixel

Itch.io link: https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/fire-column-pixel-art-effect

- Floor texture: 

Author: vectorpixelstar

Itch.io link: https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/textures?download

Modification: Included Edits to look like Magma Tile

- Music: Fun - Vibe Tracks
